title: Biennial Procedures for Motor Carriers
content:
Biennial Procedures for Motor Carriers

State Regulations
§ 6.10 - Physical qualifications for drivers to be considered in initial pre-employment and subsequent biennial physical examinations
§ 6.11 - Biennial behind-the-wheel driving tests
§ 6.12 - Biennial oral or written examinations

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
